code: import sanityClient from'@sanity/client';import imageUrlBuilder from'@sanity/image-url';export var client=sanityClient({projectId:process.env.REACT_APP_SANITY_PROJECT_ID,dataset:'production',apiVersion:'2022-08-17',useCdn:true,token:process.env.REACT_APP_SANITY_TOKEN,ignoreBrowserTokenWarning:true});var builder=imageUrlBuilder(client);export var urlfor=function urlfor(source){return builder.image(source);};
